name: Cora's Adventure V2
description:
Cora's Adventure is a 2D Platformer game created in Unreal Engine 5. Cora is a Viking exploring outside of her village and gets lost. All you have to do is help her get home. Sound simple enough? You can upgrade Cora as she progresses in her journey. All progress is saved - just click continue when you finish the first level and then you can replay levels with your abilities/move onto the next level!

Controls on PC:

A to dash when unlocked.

X to throw axes.

Directional keys to move / S and D to move left and right.

Space to jump. 

I will be monitoring feedback for this, so if/when you do leave  it, please provide what platform you are on! Thank you. 

First edit: Lives on game over fixed! Thanks for the feedback!
